name: The Last Minutes
description:
Synopsis :

From the darkness, a voice emerges and promises to grant your deepest wish. You accept, and have to face the price to pay.

The Last Minutes is a short (~10 minutes) minimalistic walking sim, allowing you to explore freely your house one last time as you're about to leave Earth.

Controls :

Move : Arrow keys
Interact : Space
Validate : Return

This game was created in 72h for Ludum Dare 44.
